document_data.mainbody:
Entar Silvershield was a nobleman from the wealthy Silvershield family living in Baldurs Gate in the late 15 century.
Entar was the younger son of Torlin Silvershield and Evelyn Silvershield.
Entars son Parendarkh left the family after a quarrel, but he still lived in Baldurs Gate in the .
Entar was born in the Silvershield family and lived in the Silvershield estate in Baldurs Gate. In the , Entar was six and he was living in the estates nursery with his sister Alana.
He had childrenAccording to Ed Greenwoods tweet, in noble circles of Baldurs Gate, wasnt uncommon to arrange marriages involving very young individuals, often intended to solidify legacies and alliances. Nevertheless, this tradition was losing popularity as the years go by, largely due to widespread dissatisfaction in these unions.It could be that the same spell that had accelerated Skies aging, was cast upon Entar., but some of them left Baldurs Gate in the 1470s DR and there was no information about where they had gone or what had become of them.
